text:
<Directory /foo>
   Fallbackresource /index.php
</Directory>

induces that FallbackResource is set for /foo/bar and all subdirs, unless another resource is set as FallbackResource. 
It cannot be deactivated.

The attached patch adds support for disabling FallbackResource, by defining the keyword "disabled".

As soon as this patch is accepted, I will update the documentation (which I can commit on).

Regards,

gryzor
creator: gryzor@apache.org
